# Path To Path
 Allows turning path blocks and farmland back into dirt by sneak right-clicking with a shovel on path blocks or hoe on farmland.
 
![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Mod%20Loader-Quilt-lightyellow?logo=data:image/png;base64,) ![](https://img.shields.io/github/license/madcaker/pathtopath)

---
*Why the name?*  
The name is based off of [Path to Dirt](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/path-to-dirt)  and [Dirt2Path](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/dirt2path) just because I thought it was funny  

*Forge?*   
No. Dirt to Path and Path to Dirt cover forge already.  

*Fabric?*  
Maybe, if I have the time. Feel free to start a PR, any help is appreciated.

*Is this required client side?*  
This mod will work purely server side, however no sound will play on clients missing the mod.
